Traits.Name: Flying
Traits.Description: Ignores all terrain and terrain effects other than impassable terrain, and ignores engagement and obstruction.

Actions.Name: Ear Splitting Shriek
Actions.Description: Foes in range 2 of the Harpy must save or become branded and lose all stances.

Actions.Name: Song of Deadly Soothing
Actions.Stance: The Harpy gains aura 2. Foes of the Harpy that start their turn in the aura must save or become shoved as far as possible towards the harpy, branded, and pacified.
